# What is RMarkdown?



```{r setup, include = FALSE}
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
rinline <- function(code) { 
  sprintf('<code class="r">``` `r %s` ```</code>', code) 
}
rcode <- function(code) { 
  sprintf('<code class="r">%s</code>', code) 
}
```
